oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hail! Glorious banner of our land
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Liberty; Flags; Sailing ships; Eagles; Ammunition; Symbols
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cover depicts Lady Liberty standing boldly in a harbor with her left foot on wrapped coils of gunpowder encased around an axe. The American Eagle is shown to her right rear and tall ships can be seen in the harbor. Color.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: T. Sinclair's Lith.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Kenneth D. Rose Sheet Music Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Respectfully inscribed to Major General George B. McClellan by Mrs. Mary Farrell Moore, Cincinnati, Ohio, July 4th, 1861." Music by Charles Warren, Cincinnati.
